text: Uye naizvozvo takava tinotumira kwauri (Muhammad (SAW)) Qurâ€™aan murudzi rwechiArab kuti uve unoyambira amai vemaguta (Makkah) nezvakaikomberedza, uye kuyambira nezvezuva regungano iro risina fungidziro, apo rimwe bato richave muParadhiso (avo vaitenda muna Allah uye vachitevera dzidziso dzaMuhammad (SAW)), uye rimwe bato mumarimi emoto (avo vaisatenda munaAllah uye vasingatevedzeri dzidziso dzaMuhammad (SAW)
